name: influxdb
description: InfluxDB is an open source time series database for recording metrics, events, and analytics.

parameters.name: ROOT_USERNAME
parameters.description: The username to set for the system's initial super-user

parameters.name: ROOT_PASSWORD
parameters.description: The password to set for the system's inital super-user

parameters.name: DB_ORG
parameters.description: The name to set for the system's initial organization

parameters.name: DB_BUCKET
parameters.description: The name to set for the system's initial bucket
